attributes.action: The House of Commons to have a vote of no confidence in Her Majesty's Government
attributes.additional_details: The current conservative government are allowing the current Health Secretary (Jeremy Hunt) to erode and degrade the NHS so that in time it will be privatised and patients will be worse off. The fact that he has imposed the contract on the junior doctors is such an example of how little regard he has for such hard working staff. The fact the current government has not removed him and voided this decision highlights concerns that this is the beginning of the end for the NHS.
attributes.background: The current Conservative government is degrading the NHS which is one of the corner stones of British culture. The enforcement of the junior doctors contract is one example of how little respect this government has for the staff and patients of the NHS.
